changeSet.author: CC
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phoneNumber VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, emailAddress VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id Primary Key (id) )

changeSet.author: CC
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE photos( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id Primary Key (id) )

changeSet.author: CC
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE events( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, photo_id BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, event_date DATETIME NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id Primary Key (id), CONSTRAINT FK_event_photo_id FOREIGN KEY (photo_id) REFERENCES photos(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT Fk_event_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE )
